巺字的基本解释

巺
xùn
古同“巽”。

巺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xùn］
［《廣韻》蘇困切，去慁，心。］
亦作“顨1”。
(1)卦名。八卦之一。又六十四卦之一，巽下巽上。详“八卦”、“六十四卦”。
(2)东南方。
(3)卑顺；谦让。
(4)履；践。

Basic explanation of words
巺
xùn
Gu Tong "Sunda".
巺
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xùn］
["Guangyun" Su sleepy and cut, go sullen, heart. ]
Also known as "顨1".
(1) Gua name. One of the gossip. Another one of the sixty-four hexagrams, Sunda under Sunda. Details of "Bagua" and "Sixty-four Gua".
(2) Southeast.
(3) Humble; humble.
(4) Fulfill; practice.
